lines.text: Excuse me, but your mother is a prostitute, your father is a crook, and your grandfather is a man with a very broad buttocks.
Allow me to explain. Your mother is a whore, your father is a damn thief, and your grandfather is a notorious fag.
Your friend is right, compañero. When you're about to die, don't ask so many questions.
We fight for the cause of liberty and justice!
I've heard those words in every country where I've sold guns.
If you ever come to Sweden, I'll let you meet my sister.

[singing]
Beautiful eyes, just like the sky... just like your sister, huh?
